#ifndef Chapter6_H
#define Chapter6_H

/*  Exercise 6.8: Write a header file named Chapter6.h that contains declarations for the functions you wrote for the
    exercises in ยง 6.1 (p. 205).*/

int getFactorial(int num);  //  takes a parameter of int type and returs the factorial of that number
void factorial();           //  takes no parameter, prompts user a number and print factorial of that number
int absValue(int num);      //  takes a parameter of int type and returns the absolute value of the number

#endif
